File Viewer Settings Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Click the Settings button in the Data File Viewer dialog box to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to specify the number of data values to display in the Values (table) and Analog values (graph) pages of the Data File Viewer dialog box.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Number of values (table)—Specifies the number of values to display in the Values (table) page.
    • Load all values—Specifies to load all values in the data file to the Values (table) page.
    • Load limited number of values—Specifies to load a limited number of values in the data file to the Values (table) page.
      • Number of values—Specifies the number of values to load.
      • Starting at—Specifies the index of the value from which to start loading the values.
  • Number of values (graph)—Specifies the number of values to display in the Analog values (graph) page.
    • Load all values—Specifies to load all values in the data file to the Analog values (graph) page.
    • Load limited number of values—Specifies to load a limited number of values in the data file to the Analog values (graph) page.
      • Number of values—Specifies the number of values to load.
      • Starting at—Specifies the index of the value from which to start loading the values.
